definition: sports such as ping-pong and badminton that use small balls/see also 大球[da4 qiu2]

sentences.english: Before you drop the bafl into the spinntng well, you bet a number on the layout.
sentences.chinese: 在你把小球投入轉盤之前，先在佈局上賭個號碼。

sentences.english: These young footballers show a lot of promise.
Break your concentration and the ball descends.
sentences.chinese: 你注意力一旦分散，小球就會下降。

sentences.english: A tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur.
sentences.chinese: 一個蝙蝠糞和硫磺小球。

sentences.english: Roll the dough into small balls.
Seen here within the glomeruli are crescents composed of proliferating epithelial cells.
sentences.chinese: 腎小球內由增生的壁層上皮細胞組成的新月體。

sentences.english: This is a PAS stain of nodular glomerulosclerosis (Kimmelstiel-Wilson disease) in a patient with long-standing diabetes mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 長期糖尿病病人結節性腎小球硬化的PAS染色。

sentences.english: I watch what the coaches are doing and how they speak to the kids.
sentences.chinese: 我看那些教練都在幹什麼，如何跟小球員們交流。

sentences.english: First, click the blue ball to access the project-creation wizard. Then create an app called SimpleServletApp using the package called gaej.example, as shown in Figure 2
sentences.chinese: 第一步，單擊藍色小球以訪問項目創建嚮導。

sentences.english: Copolymer beads of styrene and divinylbenzene were sulfonated by microwave heating.
sentences.chinese: 用微波加熱使苯乙烯和二乙烯苯共聚小球磺化。

sentences.english: The glomeruli show irregular thickening and splitting of basement membranes.
sentences.chinese: 腎小球表現爲不規則增厚，基底膜分離。

sentences.english: The plastic would be culled and turned into pellets for plastic production.
sentences.chinese: 塑料將會在被精挑細選之後製成小球來生產塑料產品。

sentences.english: For this activity, two photogates measure the initial speed of the ball.
sentences.chinese: 在這個實驗中，兩個光門測量小球的初速度。

sentences.english: And the ball is attached to that disc with string.
sentences.chinese: 小球用繩子繫於轉盤上。

sentences.english: The Blood consists of five coagulated globules and has an earthly color resembling the yellow of ochre. [Source]
sentences.chinese: 那些血液凝固成的五個小球有點類似於黃赭色。

sentences.english: Lie flat on your stomach with the ball between your ankles.

definition: sports such as soccer, basketball and volleyball that use large balls/see also 小球[xiao3 qiu2]
cricket (ball game)/also called 板球[ban3 qiu2]
